commit.message:
Harmony 412 - Easier startup for service developers (#19)

* HARMONY-412: Add Harmony to local k8s cluster

* HARMONY-412: Add start script for Harmony in container

* HARMONY-412: Add run scripts for Harmony

* HARMONY-412: Add build script for service images

* HARMONY-412: Change query-cmr image build to not need npm

* HARMONY-412: Fix Docker build for cmr-granule-locator and update README

* HARMONY-412: Changes to fix issues with harmony image in k8s
* build sqlite db during Docker build
* build query-cmr code into harmony-local image

* HARMONY-412: Change harmony to include k8s sercretes to not need .env for OAUTH

* HARMONY-412: Add Dockerfile to create cmr-granule-locator image for k8s

* HARMONY-412: Fix harmony-build call to docker build

* HARMONY-412: Add COOKE_SECRET to k8s shared secrets to support harmony in k8s

* HARMONY-412: Strip newlines from base64 output because they break YAML

* HARMONY-412: Fix service results links to use 'localhost' instead of 'localstack'

* HARMOMY-412: Move fix for singed urls to object-store.ts

* HARMOMY-412: Remove direct import of `useLocalStack` from env.ts
Needed because it was failing to compile for some reason after npm update

* HARMONY-412: Update Dockerfile to use npm v7

* HARMONY-812: Upate README with better curl example for quick start

* HARMONY-412: Revert build command in query-cmr task

* HARMONY-412: Change env vars to fix local development

* HARMONY-412: README.md update

* HARMONY-412: Read services.yml from a configmap
Needed to make launching Harmony easier

* HARMONY-412: Add script to bootstrap harmony locally

* HARMONY-412: Add build/publish for harmonyservices/harmony image

* HARMONY-412: Fix example `curl` in README for Quick Start

* HARMONY-412: Add scripts to restart harmony and reload service images

* HARMONY-412: Add scripts to reload images and restart Harmony

* HARMONY-412: Short url for Argo

* HARMONY-412: Fix printing of prompt in script

* HARMONY-412: Add wait for parallel builds to finish in image build script

* HARMONY-412: Update comment for BACKEND_HOST

* HARMONY-412: Make non-secret AUTH cred fields visible to avoid typos

* HARMONY-412: Attempt to trigger publish of harmony image on branch push

* HARMONY-412: Change publish-tasks.yml to publish.yml since publishes more than tasks

* HARMONY-412: Final cleanup to respond to PR comments

* HARMONY-412: Set KUBE_CONTEXT=minikube on Linux

* HARMONY-412: Run minkube tunnel in background to allow scripts to proceed

* HARMONY-412: Hide output from minikube tunnel

* HARMONY-412: Commit to trigger build of harmony with "latest" tag

* HARMONY-412: Get Harmony working in Kubernetes on Linux

* HARMONY-412: Fix typo in YML

* HARMONY-412: Updated dependeny to try to fish SNYK vulnerability

* HARMONY-412: Attempt to fix SNYK dependency vulnerability
